DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the trial is to compare nipple stimulation with a breast pump to pitocin for induction of labor in term pregnancies.
DOC.brief_title: Breast Stimulation Versus Pitocin for Induction of Labor
DOC.criteria: 18 years and older completed 37 weeks gestation singleton pregnancy reassuring fetal heart rate at admission monitor multiple pregnancies known fetal malformations non reassuring NST polyhydramnios (AFI>220) oligohydramnios PET IUGR macrosomia (EFW >4000g) antepartum bleeding maternal fever
DOC.keyword: comparison of two methods for induction of labor
